named-query.name: summaryReport
named-query.query: SELECT c.order_id, SUM ((b.price / b.quantity) * c.orderAmount) FROM CustomerOrderEntity c JOIN BeverageEntity b ON c.beverageEntity.id = b.id GROUP BY c.order_id

named-query.name: detailedReport
named-query.query: select c.beverageEntity.incentiveEntity.dtype, sum ((b.price / b.quantity) * c.orderAmount) from CustomerOrderEntity c join BeverageEntity b on c.beverageEntity.id = b.id where c.beverageEntity is not null group by c.beverageEntity.incentiveEntity.dtype
